name: Tanks 2D Demo
description:
This is a game I made in I few hours as a demo of RyanStevensonMakesArt's pack TanksPack2d. Enjoy and don't forget to download the art.

Bug Fixes-

2022/12/22: Fixed enemies counter.

2022/12/22: Fixed trees. (Some could be driven through)

Updates-

2022/12/22: Added flame tanks, updated map, and updated husks.
